summary: Dashboard feature testing complete. All 16 UI components and 23 backend API tests passed. Dashboard shows comprehensive stats, charts, and analytics for admin users.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/dashboard/stats returns 200 with correct structure (total_clients, todays_leads, new_count, contacted_count, sold_count, total_paid, total_pending, currency)
Backend: /api/dashboard/stats requires authentication
Backend: /api/dashboard/recent-clients returns list of recent clients
Backend: /api/dashboard/recent-notes returns list of recent notes
Backend: /api/dashboard/manager-stats returns 200 for admin with manager performance data
Backend: /api/dashboard/manager-stats returns 403 for non-admin users
Backend: /api/dashboard/analytics returns 200 for admin with monthly_data, tariff_stats, summary
Backend: /api/dashboard/analytics returns 403 for non-admin users
Backend: /api/dashboard/analytics accepts months parameter
Backend: /api/reminders/overdue returns list of overdue reminders
Frontend: Dashboard page loads at root URL (/) after login
Frontend: stat-todays-leads card displays Today's Leads count
Frontend: stat-total-clients card displays Total Clients count
Frontend: stat-sales-count card displays Sales Count
Frontend: stat-total-paid card displays Total Paid amount
Frontend: status-new card displays New leads count
Frontend: status-contacted card displays Contacted count
Frontend: status-sold card displays Sold count
Frontend: pending-alert shows pending payments when total_pending > 0
Frontend: manager-stats-card shows Manager Statistics table (admin only)
Frontend: analytics-summary shows Revenue, Deals, New Leads, Growth with month-over-month percentages
Frontend: monthly-chart shows Monthly Statistics bar chart (Bitimlar/Yangi)
Frontend: revenue-chart shows Revenue line chart with trend
Frontend: tariff-stats shows Tariff breakdown with pie chart
Frontend: recent-clients-card shows list of 5 recent clients
Frontend: recent-notes-card shows list of recent notes
Frontend: Dashboard is mobile responsive - all components stack properly
seed_data_creation: Test manager user created for role-based access testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard feature is fully implemented and tested. All 16 UI components verified with data-testid attributes. Charts use recharts library (BarChart, LineChart, PieChart). Analytics section only visible to admin users. Dashboard endpoints: /api/dashboard/stats, /api/dashboard/recent-clients, /api/dashboard/recent-notes, /api/dashboard/manager-stats (admin), /api/dashboard/analytics (admin). Mobile responsiveness verified.

manager_stats.visibility: Admin only - verified 403 for manager role

recent_data.recent_clients: Working - shows 5 most recent clients with status badges
recent_data.recent_notes: Working - shows recent notes with dates

features_verified.mobile_responsive: Working - all components stack properly on mobile viewport
